jd_information.description: Job Description 1. Candidate shall be receiving international tour package requirement from clients through different portals like phone, mails, web query and walk ins.2. Candidates shall be working on client's tour package requirement and purpose the best possible plan as per his requirement and budget. 3. Candidate shall follow client and convert the inquiry into sales.4. Candidate should be understanding the client's requirement, drafting and presenting packages as per his/her needs.5. Candidate would be pitching sales and close sales.6. Candidate would be in sales. Should have sound knowledge of International destinations.7. Candidate should be processing the respective booking with the respective vendors, preparing vouchers, cost sheet with all relevant documents.
